about_the_game:
DEMO VERSION:

The FoolHut Pack Demo contains three games, you can play them from start to finish but some features from the full pack are missing in the demo.

  • You Died But A Picomancer Revived You: Find the correct path to the stairs using nonogram logic! In the demo version, not all levels are available.
  • PuPaiPo Space 3D DX - color edition - : Arcade space shooter in "three dee". In the demo version, you can't select a starting stage.
  • Red Handsome Loop: Run around in circles and watch out for obstacles! In the demo version, you can't select a starting stage or endless mode.

These games were developed for April Fools and are tiny re-invented versions of BolHut games. Now you can play them all together in one pack! All three games have gotten extra polish and new stuff like extra levels or new enemies, as well as adding achievements and other settings.

*ERROR - SPOILER - 3 GAMES IN 1
The demo version is missing the fourth "3 games in 1" combined game.
